# WKUserInterfaceDirectionPolicy.content

**Case**

The directionality follows the CSS/HTML/XHTML specifications.

## Declaration

```swift
case content
```

## Discussion

This is the default value of [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebViewConfiguration/userInterfaceDirectionPolicy].

## Direction Policies

- **WKUserInterfaceDirectionPolicy.system**: The directionality follows the view’s user interface layout direction.
